cjsnow.senseiIntro.greetings: Greetings Ninja. Use these cards to master the ancient art of Card-Jitsu.
cjsnow.senseiIntro.amulet: This Amulet is a symbol of your ninja triumphs. You are ready. Begin.
cjsnow.gemaward.impressive: Impressive! Take this Snow Gem and wear it proudly.
cjsnow.gemaward.challenge: The time has come to face our greatest challenge. Together!
cjsnow.progresstab.title: My Progress
cjsnow.progresstab.tagline: Become a Snow Ninja. Discover the power of the flurry.
cjsnow.cjsagatab.title: Card-Jitsu Saga
cjsnow.cjsagatab.tagline: Unite with ninjas in Card-Jitsu Snow battle to unlock

cjsnow.buypowercardstab.title: Power Cards
cjsnow.powercards.msg: These 3 Power Cards have been added to your inventory.
cjsnow.quit.confirm: Are you sure you want to quit this game?
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.title: Ninja Tip:
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.eachturn:
Each turn, choose a move and an action -
attack, revive, or Power Card attack.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.combo:
Create a Combo when 2 or more ninjas
play a Power Card in the same turn.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.fillstamina:
Every move, action, and hit charges your
power meter. Unlock a Power Card when
the meter is full.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.revive:
Ninja down? Use a turn to revive your
teammate.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.snowrange:
Snow Ninja - Keep your distance from
enemies and use your impressive range.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.snowheal:
Snow Ninja - Heal ninjas with Power
Cards to keep the team strong.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.saferevive:
Ward off nearby enemies before reviving
a ninja to keep them safe.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.block:
Stop enemies from attacking the Snow
Ninja by blocking their path.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tankcleave:
Tank thwacks 3 tiles in a strike. Don't
stand shoulder-to-shoulder in front of him.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.scrapaoe:
Scrap swings at ninjas standing next to his
target. Don't huddle together around him.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.slyrush:
Sly hits harder from a distance. Get in
close to take less damage.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.maxpowercarda:
Get the most out of your Power Cards.
Try to strike all enemies in range on a
single attack.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.playallthecar:
Power Cards are dealt randomly. Keep
charging your power meter to play all the
cards you own.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.snowpowercard:
Snow Power Cards can revive a fallen
ninja. Watch out for nearby enemies, who
may attack again!
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.maxcards:
Ninjas can hold 4 mighty Power Cards at
a time. You must play a card to collect the
next.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tuskattacksro:
Avoid Tusk's attack! He blasts icicles
down 2 rows at a time, across the board.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tuskfirestun:
Fire Ninja - Stun Tusk between row
attacks to delay icicle storms and blast
backs.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tusksenseibac:
Sensei will back you up with a Power
Card attack every 3 turns.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tusksenseihea:
Sensei's Snow Power Card comes 3 turns
after his Water attack. Stay near the middle
to be healed.
cardjitsu_snowloading.tips.tuskstackpush: Stack up behind other ninjas for Tusk's blast attack. The ninja in front won't fly back as far and can attack Tusk faster.
